long_description: Small and compact, the Deuter City Light Pack is ready for action around town or on your next overseas adventure. Contoured, padded shoulder straps let you carry in comfort. Foam back panel with mesh lining allows good airflow with minimal back contact. Flexible aluminium stays within the foam profile can be bent to fit the back exactly. Removable waistband; zippered front pocket; special pocket isolates wet items. Deuter City Light Pack features stretch-mesh side pockets for water bottles, snacks, more. Closeout.
short_description: Small and compact, the Deuter City Light Pack is ready for action around town or on your next overseas adventure.
